SNAct1:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
SNAct1:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

SNAct1:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
SNAct1:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
SNAct1:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

SNAct1:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
SNAct1:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

SNAct1:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
SNAct1:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !SNAct1:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

SNAct1:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
SNAct1:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !SNAct1:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
